name: CafeFinder
tagline: Find A Nearby Cafe, Do Work Wherever.
body:
### Welcome to CafeFinder
Find freelancer-friendly cafes and coffee shops nearby. Each cafe has free wifi, power outlets, good seating, and most importantly COFFEE.





### Powered By StoreMapper
This app is a little side project Powered by [StoreMapper Store Locator Software](http://www.storemapper.co) my dead simple store locator app. With StoreMapper you can add a store locator, dealer locator, or like this project a list of any locations and your users & customers can find the nearest location. You can easily embed StoreMapper on ANY website including Wordpress, Joomla, Drupal sites or e-commerce sites powered by [Shopify](http://www.shopify.com/?ref=tyler-tringas), BigCommerce, Magento, 3dCart, OpenCart and pretty much anything else you can think of.

### Why CafeFinder Exists
I recently spent over a year traveling the world while learning to code, doing freelance web development, and prototyping my solar energy startup [SolarList](http://www.solarlist.com). I had a lot of fun, but I was also quite serious about staying productive and getting work done. Every time I went to a new city I had a mad scramble to find a suitable cafe for doing work. A good cafe has the following:
* Fast (preferably free) Wifi
* Power Outlets
* Plenty of comfortable seating
* Food & Restrooms
* And most importantly a freelancer-friendly vibe where you won't get glared at for hanging around for a few hours.

### Contribute Your Own Suggestions
Fill out the form below and I'll do a quick double-check and add your suggestion to the map. Thanks!

### Author
I blog about [myself](http://www.tylertringas.com) and [my startup](http://www.solarlist.com/solar-blog). I sometimes say interesting things on Twitter so:
